fixed_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to 1 foe equal to 106.2/111.5/116.8% of Attack. 59.0/62.0/64.9% chance to inflict Windswept for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Garu

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 2.9%. After knocking down a foe, increase Wind damage by 20% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Dance of the Wind

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 2.9%. After knocking down a foe, increase Wind damage by 23% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Dance of the Wind I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
